Title: Dark City
Writer: Alex Proyas (story), Alex Proyas (screenplay), Lem Dobbs (screenplay), David S. Goyer (screenplay)
Actors: Rufus Sewell, William Hurt, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly
Plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.
